name: Goblet Reverse Lunge
cues: Stand tall holding a dumbbell vertically at your chest with both hands
Step back with one leg, lowering into a lunge until your back knee nearly touches the floor
Keep your front knee over your ankle and torso upright
Push through your front heel to return to standing
Keep your core braced and chest up
Avoid letting your front knee cave inward
variations: Use a kettlebell or ruck plate
